author: Special Correspondent
text:
Students of Bharathidasan University Constituent College make a formation with the slogan 'Vote not sale' in Perambalur on Wednesday.

The district administration made an innovative arrangement for sensitising the masses to the need for exercising franchise without fear or favour. Utilising the students of Bharathidasan University Constituent College at Kurumbalur near here, the district administration made special arrangement by arranging a human chain on the slogan “Vote not sale”.

S. Meenakshi, District Revenue Officer, administered a pledge to the students on the importance of exercising the franchise. The pledge emphasised for enrolling all eligible young voters. Natarajan, Principal of the College, spoke on the importance of voting.
title: “Vote not sale” campaign launched in Perambalur
